articles.title: Indian cricket star Rishabh Pant badly injured in horrific car accident - Daily Mail
articles.description: Pant, 25, was alone in the car when it crashed close to his hometown of Roorkee in the northern state of Uttarakhand. It was reported he lost control of the vehicle when he 'dozed off'.
articles.content:
India star Rishabh Pant was in a stable condition on Friday night after suffering multiple injuries in a motor accident in which his car flipped and caught fire.
